## Description

Oral Histories of Economics is a research project gathering and disseminating oral sources about the history and philosophy of economics.

The sources gathered by the project are open-access data. They can be freely used by researchers interested in the evolution of economics and economistsâ€™ practices.

The collections are available on the [Oral histories of Economics website](https://www.oralhistoriesofeconomics.org/accueil).
